questions.question: Why did ancient humans have the need to count?
options: To determine the quantity of food they had
To keep track of the passing days
To count the number of animals in their livestock
questions.correct: To determine the quantity of food they had
questions.learning_objective: Understand the need for counting in ancient civilizations
